content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
I've had a lot of Korean food but nothing beats this place. Every single meal we ordered was phenomenal, service was top notch and the server's had wonderful recommendations that complimented our orders even better. We loved all of their spicy food and will 100% be back to try even more. 10/10 would eat again.
